message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's better to secure a deal now before inflation eats away at the value.
I think we can both do better. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need a bigger share to make it worthwhile. Let's find a compromise.
Bob, time is running out! I'll take a slight hit and offer you $45, while I take $55.  Any more rounds and the deal will be worse for both of us!
